summary: Successfully tested all session display logic features. Backend: 10/10 tests passed. Frontend: All features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth/login - Coach Developer login works
Backend: GET /api/coaches - Returns sessionCount and upcomingCount for each coach
Backend: GET /api/observations - Returns sessions with status and planned_date
Backend: POST /api/observations - Creates planned sessions with future date
Backend: POST /api/observations - Creates draft sessions correctly
Backend: GET /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions - Returns sessions for specific coach
Backend: Sessions have dates for calendar display (created_at or planned_date)
Frontend: HomePage shows 'Upcoming Observations' card with planned sessions
Frontend: HomePage 'Upcoming Observations' shows Start button for each session
Frontend: HomePage 'Your Sessions' shows only draft, active, completed (not planned)
Frontend: SessionCalendar loads from cloud API (not localStorage)
Frontend: Calendar displays sessions on correct dates with color-coded dots
Frontend: MyCoaches shows sessionCount badge (calendar icon with number)
Frontend: MyCoaches shows upcomingCount badge (clock icon with number)
Frontend: CoachProfile Sessions tab has 'Upcoming' section (blue background)
Frontend: CoachProfile Sessions tab has 'Observation History' section
Frontend: CoachProfile Sessions tab has 'In Progress' section

features_verified.homepage_upcoming_observations: WORKING - Planned sessions appear in 'Upcoming Observations' card with Planned badge and Start button
features_verified.homepage_your_sessions: WORKING - Only non-planned sessions (draft, active, completed) appear in 'Your Sessions'
features_verified.session_calendar_cloud_api: WORKING - SessionCalendar loads from fetchCloudSessions() not localStorage
features_verified.session_calendar_display: WORKING - Both planned and completed sessions display on correct dates
features_verified.my_coaches_badges: WORKING - Shows sessionCount (completed) and upcomingCount (planned) badges

critical_code_review_comments: HomePage.jsx correctly separates sessions into upcoming (planned with future/today date) and regular (draft, active, completed)
SessionCalendar.jsx properly calls fetchCloudSessions() from cloudSessionService instead of localStorage
CoachProfile.jsx Sessions tab correctly filters sessions by status into Upcoming, Observation History, and In Progress sections
Backend list_all_coaches() correctly counts completed sessions (sessionCount) and planned sessions (upcomingCount) separately
seed_data_creation: Test sessions were created during backend tests and cleaned up after. Existing sessions found: 2 planned, 1 draft, 1 completed
context_for_next_testing_agent: Session display logic is fully working: 1) HomePage separates planned sessions to 'Upcoming Observations' card, other sessions to 'Your Sessions', 2) Calendar loads from cloud API and shows sessions on dates, 3) CoachProfile Sessions tab has separate sections for Upcoming/History/In Progress, 4) MyCoaches shows both sessionCount and upcomingCount badges. Test data exists in preview environment with coach_67857d39dbbc having 4 sessions.
